### AI Trends Summary

The discussed AI content spans a range of experiments and applications in Large Language Models (LLMs), focusing on fine-tuning techniques, the utilization of OpenAI Functions, and the integration of vector databases and embeddings to enhance model performance and application relevance. Additionally, innovative AI-powered tools for social media filtering and a curated, sentiment-analyzed AI/ML weekly digest highlight practical AI applications and the ongoing efforts to distill and interpret vast amounts of data for user convenience and insight generation. These developments underscore the versatility of LLMs in both technical enhancements and user-oriented solutions.

tech_news.markdown:
## ðŸ’» Tech News - 2025-11-03

### Top Stories

1. [A quick and easy way to visually save ideas](https://www.p4d.io)

2. [Oxy is Cloudflare's Rust-based next generation proxy framework](https://blog.cloudflare.com/introducing-oxy/)

3. [The A.I.-Profits Drought and the Lessons of History](https://www.newyorker.com/news/the-financial-page/the-ai-profits-drought-and-the-lessons-of-history)

4. [Mamdani Has a Point About Rent Control](https://www.theatlantic.com/economy/archive/2025/11/mamdani-housing-rent-control/684790/)

5. [Why Every Family Needs a Code Word](https://www.wsj.com/tech/personal-tech/why-every-family-needs-a-code-word-e077ab76)

6. [Cara Menghubungi CS OCBC](https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=45795639)

7. [Why home sellers are rejecting buyers' love notes](https://sfstandard.com/2025/11/02/trouble-letter-home-sellers-rejecting-buyers-love-notes/)

8. [My previous post suggesting that China annex Singapore and Australia clearly](https://twitter.com/BeijingDai/status/1984973886287470602)

9. [When fintech startups outgrow their own controls, Linqto's collapse as a warning](https://capitalfolly.com/linqto-cutting-corners/)

10. [Scala vs. F#](https://alexn.org/blog/2025/11/01/scala-vs-fsharp/)

### Summary

1. This item introduces a tool designed for effortlessly capturing and organizing visual ideas, highlighting the importance of streamlined creativity and idea management in the digital age.
2. Cloudflare has developed Oxy, a cutting-edge proxy framework built on Rust, emphasizing advancements in network technology and the growing adoption of Rust for system-level programming tasks.
3. The discussion around the A.I.-Profits Drought examines the challenges of monetizing AI innovations, drawing parallels with historical tech developments to underline the cyclical nature of hype and profitability in the tech sector.
4. The commentary on Mamdani's stance regarding rent control sheds light on the complexities of housing policies and their socioeconomic impacts, suggesting a nuanced perspective on managing housing affordability.
5. The recommendation for every family to have a code word underscores the importance of safety and communication in protecting against emergencies or threats, highlighting a practical approach to family security.
